PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-06262024-05-31JUS
ActContraventions Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Application of Provincial Laws Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the APPLICATION OF PROVINCIAL LAWS REGULATIONS in order to (1) incorporate the sections 530 to 530.1 of the Criminal Code to rectify inconsistencies and clarify its application in New Brunswick, as it is otherwise applied across Canada; and (2) update references to standards and other documents incorporated by reference.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0115 Publication Date: 2024-06-19
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the APPLICATION OF PROVINCIAL LAWS REGULATIONS in order to (1) incorporate the sections 530 to 530.1 of the Criminal Code to rectify inconsistencies and clarify its application in New Brunswick, as it is otherwise applied across Canada; and (2) update references to standards and other documents incorporated by reference.
